rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: People who have appeared on stage in theatrical productions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Actor

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property relating an actor to information about a character played by the actor in a theatrical production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Roles

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Fictional beings who are part of a play and are represented by actors in a theatrical production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Character

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a theatrical character to information about the operas in which the character appears.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Operas

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a character to a play in which the character appears, e.g. Hamlet is a character is Shakespeare's play of the same name.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Play

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a character to information about an actor who played the character in a theatrical production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A person who designs stylized sequences of movement, in many cases dances, for theatrical productions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Choreographer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a person to a theatrical production in which he or she acted as choreographer.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Plays Choreographed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An organization that stages theatrical productions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Company

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a theater company to a theatrical production of the company.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Plays Produced

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A group of dancers and support staff that stage dance performances for an audience.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Dance Company

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A person who is responsible for designing the settings and/or costumes of a theatrical production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Designer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property relating a person to information about theatrical productions where he or she has acted as designer.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Plays Designed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that collects information about the theatrical productions that a designer participated in and the roles that he or she played there.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Designer Gig

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the theatrical designer for the given engagement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Designer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the role of the designer for the given engagement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Design Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the theatrical production for the given engagement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Production

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing standard descriptors for the sorts of role that theatrical designers might play in a theatrical production, e.g. puppetry and costume design.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Designer Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a designer role to information about designers who have played this role in a theatrical production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Designers

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A person who has overall responsibility for all of the creative aspects of a theatrical production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Director

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a person to a theatrical production that he or she has directed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Plays Directed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing standard descriptors for the form, style or subject matter of a theatrical production, e.g. experimental theater or Victorian burlesque.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Genre

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property relating a theatrical genre to a play that exemplifies the genre.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Plays

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A person who is responsible for realizing the musical aspects of a theatrical production, typically the conductor of a group, e.g. an orchestra, that plays the soundtrack of the production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Musical Director

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property relating a person to a theatrical production in which he or she acted as musical director.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Directed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Recording (live or studio) of the musical accompaniment to a theatrical play or production. Note that the musical composition itself should be assigned the type theater.score.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Musical Soundtrack

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a musical soundtrack to the play that it is part of.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Play

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a musical soundtrack to a theatrical production that it is part of.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Production

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A dramatic or comedic narrative that is intended to be realized as a theatrical production. Note that a play, a production, and a performance are different notions. A play can be realized in many productions, and a production can result in many performances.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Play

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a play to one of the characters who appear in the play.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Characters

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a play to a person who composed the music for the play. Note that this property applies only to musicals and other plays with music.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Composer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical play to the country where the play was written.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Country of Origin

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical play to the date that the play was first performed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date of First Performance

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating an mso:theater.play to the mso:theater.theater in which the play first appeared.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: First Theater

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating a theatrical play to a genre, e.g. experimental theater, that the play exemplifies.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Genre

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical play to a person who wrote the lyrics for the soundtrack of the play. Note that this property applies only to musicals and other plays with songs.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lyricist

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical play to its soundtrack.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Soundtrack
Orchestrator
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: The type theater.theatrical_orchestrator has been deprecated. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:theater.play.composer]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical play to one of the authors of the play.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Playwright

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a theatrical play to one of the productions of the play.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Productions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A person who secures the financial backing and hires the creative personnel for a theater production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Producer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical producer to one of his or her productions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Plays Produced

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The realization of a play on the stage by a theatrical company. Note that a play, a production, and a performance are different notions. A play can be realized in many productions, and a production can result in many performances.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Production

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a theatrical production to information about which characters were portrayed by which actors in the production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cast

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to a choreographer of the production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Choreographer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to the date of the last performance of the production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date Closed

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to the date of the first performance of the production. Note that this is the official opening date, not the date that previews of the production began.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Date Opened

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a theatrical production to information about the designers involved in the production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Designers

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to the director of the production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Director

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to the musical director of the production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Musical Director

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to its soundtrack.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Soundtrack

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to a number indicating the total number of performances corresponding to the production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Performances

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to the play that the production is based on.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Play

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to its producer.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Producer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to the company that is responsible for the production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Company

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical production to the theater where performances are held.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: For productions of plays performed in a language other than the one the play was written in, the translation used can be entered here.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Translation Used
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: Translations are relative to the play, not the production. Accordingly, the property book.written_work.translation can be used. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:book.written_work.translation]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A person, other than an actor, who is involved in realizing a theatrical production, e.g. the producer, the director, the designer, and the technical crew.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Production Staffmember

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a production staff member to information about the theatrical productions in which he or she participated.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Productions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that collects information about the theatrical productions that a production staff member participated in and the roles that he or she played there.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Production Staff Gig

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the date when the given engagement began.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: From

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the theatrical production for the given engagement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Production

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the production staff member for the given engagement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Staff Member

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the role of the production staff member for the given engagement.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Production Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the date when the given engagement ended.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing standard descriptors for the roles that can be held by people who are involved in the technical aspects of a theatrical production, e.g. electrician, creative consultant, and casting director.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Production Staff Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a production staff role to information about the people who have held this role.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Person

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that collects information about the theatrical productions that an actor participated in and the characters that he or she played there.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the actor who played the character in the given theatrical production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Actor

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the character played by the actor in the given theatrical production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Character

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies when the actor began playing the character in the given production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: From

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the theatrical production where the actor played the character.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Production

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies when the actor stopped playing the character in the given production.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A musical composition that is part of a play or of particular production of a play and that typically includes other compositions. Recordings (live or studio) that have been released of the play's music should not be assigned this type. Instead, they should be assigned to the type theater.musical_soundtrack.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Score

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical score to its corresponding play.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Play

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical score to a production that uses this score.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Production

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a theatrical score to a corresponding soundtrack.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Soundtrack

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A structure with a stage and seating for an audience where theatrical productions are performed.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theater

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking a theater to a production that was held at the theater.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theatrical Productions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A person who has written one or more musical soundtracks for plays.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theatrical Composer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking a person to a play for which he or she has composed the music.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Plays

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A person, group or organization that has written lyrics for songs that are part of theatrical productions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Theatrical Lyricist

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a theatrical lyricist to a play for which he or she wrote lyrics.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Plays
Theatrical Orchestrator
rdf:Description.mso:type.type.deprecation_info: There is too much overlap between this type and theater.theatrical_composer. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:theater.theatrical_composer]
